meaningMnemonic: You see a <radical>child</radical> with an <radical>umbrella</radical> in front of you. Suddenly, they fall straight down into a <kanji>cavity</kanji> in the road. It's a big <kanji>hole</kanji>!
readingMnemonic: "Into my <kanji>cavity</kanji> you go!" yells a voice. It is <reading>こう</reading>いち.
